constituent: kill, sheaf, tree, wood, cruise missile, missile, wind, crotch
koohiiStory1: X marks the spot on the tree where the missile hit. No doubt, it was meant to kill us.
koohiiStory2: I suppose when this kanji was made, it was most effective to kill your enemies with sheafs of wood used as missiles.
readingExamples: 殺人 (さつじん), 殺到 (さっとう), 黙殺 (もくさつ), 相殺 (そうさい), 殺す (ころ.す)
